# This blog

It is intended to present interesting issues. This is as data set


```{r, echo = TRUE, include = TRUE, message = FALSE}
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)

social_care = import("adult_socialcare.csv")
glimpse(social_care)
```

```{r, echo = TRUE, include = TRUE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)

social_care %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  mutate_at(vars(adult_sc), funs(as.numeric)) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(adult_sc), 
            min = min(adult_sc), 
            max = max(adult_sc)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(mean)) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(year, mean)) + geom_bar(stat ="identity")
```
